def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()
    print(t*(k//n) + t[:k%n]) #k%n is the remainder of k//n

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()
    print(t * (k // n) + t[:k % n])


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n, k = map(int, input().split())
t = input()

ans = ""
for i in range(n):
    if i < (k - 1) % n:
        ans += t[i]
    else:
        ans += t[(k - 1) % n]

print(ans)

# print(ans)

n, k = map(int, input().split())
t = input()

ans = ""
for i in range(n):
    ans += t[(i + k - 1) % n]

print(ans)

print(input())

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    print(t[0] + t[1:].replace("L", " ").replace("R", "L").replace(" ", "R"))


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()
    print((t*(k//n)) + t[:k%n])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    t = input()
    print(t*(k//n) + t[:k%n])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
